cosmos.question: I shine very brightly in the night sky, and I'm much closer than any other star. What am I?

hints.text: 🌕 I change my shape every night.

cosmos.question: I am very hot and give light to the Earth. Without me, it would be dark and cold. What am I?

hints.text: 🔥 I am a giant ball of fire.
😎 You wear sunglasses when I'm very bright.

cosmos.question: I am a group of stars that make a picture in the sky. What am I called?

hints.text: ✨ I can look like a bear or a hunter.
🔭 You need a telescope to see me better.
🌌 I am a pattern of stars.

cosmos.question: I am a big ball that goes around the Sun. Earth is one of me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌎 I can have moons that go around me.
🚀 People can travel to me in a rocket.

cosmos.question: I am a planet, known for my beautiful rings. What am I?

hints.text: 💍 My rings are made of ice and rocks.
🪐 I am very far away from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am a giant collection of stars, gas, and dust, all held together by gravity. Our solar system lives in me. What am I?

hints.text: 🌀 I am shaped like a spiral.
🥛 My name sounds like a type of drink.

cosmos.question: I am a small, icy object that flies through space, sometimes leaving a bright tail behind me. What am I?

hints.text: ☄️ I am often called a 'dirty snowball'.
☄️ I come from far away, beyond the planets.
☄️ My tail always points away from the Sun.

cosmos.question: I am the force that keeps the planets orbiting the Sun and keeps you on the ground. What am I?

hints.text: 🍎 An apple falling from a tree explains me.
🤝 I am what holds the universe together.
💪 I pull everything towards each other.

cosmos.question: I am the name for all of space and everything in it: stars, planets, galaxies, and everything else. What am I?

hints.text: 🚀 People explore me with telescopes and spacecraft.
✨ I'm thought to be expanding all the time.

cosmos.question: I am the first woman in space. Who am I?

bug.question: I have six legs and can fly. I like to buzz around flowers. What am I?
I am small and red, and I have black spots. Children think I am lucky. What am I?

hints.text: 🐞 I am a type of beetle.
🌱 You can find me on plants.

bug.question: I crawl on the ground and carry food back to my home. I am very strong for my size. What am I?

hints.text: 💪 I can lift many times my own weight.

bug.question: I start as a caterpillar, then I make a chrysalis, and finally, I can fly with beautiful wings. What am I?

hints.text: 🐛 I eat leaves when I am young.

bug.question: I chirp loudly at night and rub my wings together to make music. What am I?
I jump very high and have long back legs. I like to eat plants. What am I?
I build a web to catch my food. I have eight legs, but I am not an insect. What am I?
I eat wood and can cause damage to houses. I live in colonies underground. What am I?

hints.text: 🐜 I look similar to an ant, but I am different.

bug.question: I have many legs, and I curl up when I am scared. I like to live in dark, damp places. What am I?
I suck blood and can be very annoying in the summer. I fly and make a buzzing sound near your ear. What am I?
